# EntityFireImmuneComponent Class

## Extends
- [*EntityComponent*](EntityComponent.md)

When added, this component signifies that this entity doesn't take damage from fire.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:fire_immune";`

Type: *string*
